item.description:
Hi Packers,

Thank you to the huge crowd that turned out for the Chicago game, we hope you all enjoyed the win, The Pack are now 1-1 and will be well rested when they face Seattle one week from tonight, we will have the game on both floors so get here early to grab your seat, I will be on vacation the following week so I’m going to set up the meetup for the New Orleans game now, the Saints will come to Lambeau Field on September 30th at 4.25pm and the 2nd floor will be rocking, again please get in early to grab your seat, as usual any and all suggestions are welcome. Have a great week and GO PACK.

Ray Butler

﻿

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Monday Night Football
